name: the Squirrel Family
description:
Collection of 32 flash games in standalone .exe form (for PC). These are really REALLY tiny, mostly one-screen games. I was creating them between 2004 and 2008. Some of those are platform, other -  skill-based. All can be played in a maximized window (not fullscreen), so there's that. 

Full list of the Squirrel Family games:

  • Aeroplane
  • Automobil
  • Aviator
  • Christmas Break
  • Crazy Cruise
  • Crowded House
  • Deadly Dash
  • Deep Space
  • Egz
  • Four Seasons Spring
  • Four Seasons Summer
  • Four Seasons Autumn
  • Four Seasons Winter
  • Freaky Fun
  • Funky Forest
  • Labyrinth
  • Mars Raider
  • Oceanic
  • Octopus
  • Payback
  • Pink Panic
  • Polar Jump
  • Puppy Fetch
  • Roman Rumble
  • Run Run
  • Squirrel Escape
  • Squirrel Harvest
  • the Acrobats
  • the Kite
  • Tribal Jump
  • Twice as Bounce
  • Warehouse
